title: Watson Data Platform Pipeline Connection Schema
description: Connection schema for pipelines in the Watson Data Platform

common_pipeline_connection_def.description: Details of the connection to use for a pipeline binding node.

name.description: A name tag for disambiguating connections

ref.description: A reference to a connection by ID.

catalog_ref.description: If ref is set, this refers to the ID of the catalog which contains the connection. If neither this attribute nor project_ref are specified, the connection will be assumed to exist in the project, space, or catalog which contains the pipeline.

project_ref.description: If ref is set, this refers to the ID of the project which contains the connection. If neither this attribute nor catalog_ref are specified, the connection will be assumed to exist in the project, space, or catalog which contains the pipeline.

space_ref.description: If ref is set, this refers to the ID of the space which contains the connection. If neither this attribute nor space_ref are specified, the connection will be assumed to exist in the project, space, or catalog which contains the pipeline.

properties.description: The properties for the connection. The specific properties allowed depend on the type of connection referenced.

common_pipeline_data_asset_def.description: Details of the data asset contained in a catalog or project to use for a pipeline binding node.

ref.description: A reference to a data asset by ID.

catalog_ref.description: If ref is set, this refers to the ID of the catalog which contains the data asset. If neither this attribute nor project_ref are specified, the data asset will be assumed to exist in the project, space, or catalog which contains the pipeline.

project_ref.description: If ref is set, this refers to the ID of the project which contains the data asset. If neither this attribute nor catalog_ref are specified, the data asset will be assumed to exist in the project, space, or catalog which contains the pipeline.

space_ref.description: If ref is set, this refers to the ID of the space which contains the data asset. If neither this attribute nor space_ref are specified, the data asset will be assumed to exist in the project, space, or catalog which contains the pipeline.

properties.description: Properties controlling how the data asset is used.

attachment_ref.description: The ID of the data asset attachment to use. If not specified and used as a source, the first suitable attachment found will be used. If not specified and used as a target, a new attachment will be created.

name.description: Specifies the name of the data asset to read, create or update if ref is unset.

no_write_schema.description: When used as a target, whether to update the data asset with the schema when a run completes or not (will be automatically updated if not supplied by caller).

no_write_status.description: When used as a target, whether to update the data asset with the status when a run completes or not (will be automatically updated if not supplied by caller).
